localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Resold is a marketplace for people to buy & sell with same-day delivery. 1. List a piece of furniture on Resold 2. Request an Uber driver to have your furniture delivered in minutes. 3. Payment is delivered direct to your bank account.
blogPost.body: Resold is a marketplace for people to buy & sell with same-day delivery. 1. List a piece of furniture on Resold 2. Request an Uber driver to have your furniture delivered in minutes. 3. Payment is delivered direct to your bank account.
blogPost.title: Resold - Buy & sell with same-day delivery
blogPost.author: Joe Kuczek

localize.description: 转售是人们买卖当天送货的市场。1.将一件家具列入转售清单2.要求优步司机在几分钟内将家具送货。3.付款会直接送到您的银行账户。
轉售是人們買賣當天送貨的市場。1.將一件傢俱列入轉售清單2.要求優步司機在幾分鐘內將傢俱送貨。3.付款會直接送到您的銀行賬戶。

previous.excerpt: People around the world recorded the sounds of their forests, so you can escape into nature, while in lockdown or unable to travel. Use this site to chill, meditate or do some digital shinrin-yoku.
previous.title: Tree.fm 🌲 - Tune into forests from around the world

localize.description: 世界各地的人们记录了他们的森林之声，所以你可以在被封锁或无法旅行的情况下，逃进大自然。在这个网站上，你可以放松心情，冥想或做一些数字神林屋。
localize.tagline: 聆听来自世界各地的森林之声

localize.description: 世界各地的人們記錄了他們的森林之聲，所以你可以在被封鎖或無法旅行的情況下，逃進大自然。在這個網站上，你可以放鬆心情，冥想或做一些數字神林屋。
localize.tagline: 聆聽來自世界各地的森林之聲
